protein.specific_function: Plays a role in T-cell development and lymphocyte activation. Essential for TCR-mediated IL-2 production. Isoform 1 induces TCR-mediated signal transduction, isoform 2 does not

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity
